name: unaffected
content:
unaffected adjective
(NOT CHANGED)
Add to word list
Add to word list
C2 not influenced, harmed, or interrupted in any way: The west of the city was largely unaffected by the bombing. Flights out of most major airports were unaffected by the snow.

unaffected adjective
(SINCERE)
approving natural and sincere in your behaviour: For someone who has spent 40 years in show business she seems relatively unaffected by it all.
